title: Matt Dominick’s X Account: A Visual Journey from Space
summary: NASA astronaut and Expedition 72 Flight Engineer Matthew Dominick launched to the International Space Station on March 3, 2024 as the commander of NASA’s SpaceX Crew-8 mission. As a flight engineer aboard the orbiting laboratory, Dominick conducted scientific research while capturing breathtaking views of Earth and beyond from the ultimate vantage point—250 miles above the […]

title: Avio Receives €150M Contract to Supply Rocket Motors for CAMM-ER Missiles
summary:
Italian rocket builder Avio has secured a contract from MBDA Italia worth just under €150 million to supply rocket motors for the CAMM-ER missile system. In 2023, MBDA Italia awarded Avio an initial contract for the production of CAMM-ER (Common Anti-air Modular Missile – Extended Range) rocket motors, with deliveries scheduled to commence in 2025 […]
The post Avio Receives €150M Contract to Supply Rocket Motors for CAMM-ER Missiles appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Muon Space climate-monitoring satellites eyed for military applications
summary:
The company won a $2.9M Space Force contract to study the company’s capabilities to image clouds and theater weather

title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch latest broadcast satellite for SiriusXM on Falcon 9 rocket from the Kennedy Space Center
summary: This will be the third satellite launched by SpaceX for the broadcast radio corporation. Liftoff from Launch Complex 39A at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center is scheduled for the opening of the 90-minute launch window at 11:10 a.m. EST (1610 UTC).

title: Orbex halts work on own spaceport, shifts launches to SaxaVord
summary:
Small launch vehicle developer Orbex will halt work on its own launch site in northern Scotland and instead use a rival facility in the Shetland Islands.
The post Orbex halts work on own spaceport, shifts launches to SaxaVord appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: PSLV rocket launches Europe’s Proba-3 mission to mimic solar eclipses
summary:

title: Proba-3 lift-off replay
summary: ESA’s Proba-3 mission lifted off on its PSLV-XL rocket from Satish Dhawan Space Centre in Sriharikota, India, on Thursday, 5 December, at 11:34 CET (10:34 GMT, 16:04 local time).
